Html:
Is there anyway to add a Title 'button' next to the Logo, so it can function like the Login button of the Xune application ?

Thanks in advance
You can add any visual you like by creating your own ModernWindow template.

Thanks for the project by the way.
I just checked in a custom ModernWindow style that is completely empty and renders Content only. You might want to use this as reference. Available in the source code.
